com.gemalto.idp.mobile.authentication.mode.biofingerprint

Class BioFingerprintAuthService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.authentication.mode.biofingerprint.BioFingerprintAuthService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthService

    public class BioFingerprintAuthService
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthService
    A class that represents BioFingerprint authentication service. This is an entry point to BioFingerprint library.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Get authentication mode reference corresponding to this service.
      BioFingerprintContainer getBioFingerprintContainer()
      Get instance or BioFingerprintContainer which will be used for fingerprint verification.
      boolean isConfigured()
      Indicates if the authentication mode is configured and ready for use.

      • create

      • getAuthMode

        public BioFingerprintAuthMode getAuthMode()
        Get authentication mode reference corresponding to this service.
        Specified by:
        getAuthMode in interface AuthService
        Returns:
        current auth mode.

      • isSupported

        public boolean isSupported()
        Indicates if the authentication mode is supported by the hardware. This should be always checked before using BioFingerprint functionalities. Skipping this check is not encouraged and it may crash your application when executing on a device which is below Android M or with no fingerprint sensor.
        Specified by:
        isSupported in interface AuthService
        Returns:
        true if supported, else return false.

      • isConfigured

        public boolean isConfigured()
        Indicates if the authentication mode is configured and ready for use. For example, a user may need to configure the OS to use a particular feature, such as bio-fingerprint, before this authentication mode can be used.
        Specified by:
        isConfigured in interface AuthService
        Returns:
        true if configured, else return false.

      • getBioFingerprintContainer

        public BioFingerprintContainer getBioFingerprintContainer()
        Get instance or BioFingerprintContainer which will be used for fingerprint verification.
        Returns:
        bioFingerprintContainer
